heading: Are European SMEs facing a shortage of green skills?
subheading: 39% of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) surveyed in the EU agree that skills shortages are holding back their business in terms of greening their activities.
textNote: Fieldwork was conducted via telephone interviews from 4/5 to 24/5/2023, 12 909 interviews were conducted. Representative sample of business was selected.
